<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Create a new note for a video"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1/notes/videos/{id}/notes"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Create a new note for a video

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"in":"path","name":"id","required":true,"description":"Video ID"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["timestamp","content"],"properties":{"timestamp":{"type":"integer","minimum":0,"description":"Timestamp in seconds"},"content":{"type":"string","minLength":1,"maxLength":5000,"description":"Note content (Markdown)"},"tags":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"},"description":"Tags for categorization"}}}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
